forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 54. West southwest wind around 10 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 65. West southwest wind 6 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

weather_report:
The night whispers softly over Downtown San Francisco, cloaked in a gentle haze that promises a soothing coolness. As the city drapes itself in a patchwork of partly cloudy skies, the atmosphere hangs at a mild temperature, a restful low around 54. The soft breath of the west-southwest wind carries with it an undercurrent of serenity, stirring the leaves ever so lightly. 

As dawn breaks and ushers in Tuesday, the promise of sunshine holds the day with an inviting glow. Expect the radiant warmth to climb to a comfortable 65, as the city unfurls beneath a canopy of clear, blue skies. While the wind adds a lively dance with gusts reaching up to 21 mph, it feels more like an embrace, wrapping around you while wandering down the streets or through the gleaming parks. With a day such as this, choose attire that balances comfort with practicality—perhaps a light sweater for the early hours, transitioning into a breezy shirt for the afternoon. 

The marine layer will likely linger near the coastline, offering a mystical veil over the vistas of the Golden Gate and beyond. A walk along the waterfront might be just the remedy for a mind seeking solace or inspiration, while the inviting atmosphere beckons one to enjoy a leisurely coffee at an outdoor café or to mingle with fellow souls in the parks, cherishing these fleeting, golden moments.
